title: Chasing Life (with Dr. Sanjay Gupta)
description:
Jillian talks with CNN Chief Medical Correspondent Dr. Sanjay Gupta about his new, CNN docuseries, “Chasing Life.” With life expectancy dropping in the US, Dr. Gupta traveled to Japan, Bolivia, Turkey, India, Italy and Norway to explore what these countries are doing to live healthier and more meaningful lives.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
